name: A Helping Rand
description:
Who needs a helping hand, when you have a helping Rand? 

Transport the little cute AI robot named Rand to the door through 10 challenging levels. You are Randy, a robot geek, and you have been instructed to take care of Rand. The goal of the game is to get Rand to the door (that is located at the end of each level) by pushing him around so he can hack it in order for you to complete the level. Pretty simple, right? shouldn't be that hard. Manoeuvre Rand through various and exciting obstacles, and collaborate with him to reach the end. 

Controls:

AD for left & right

Spacebar for jump

R to reset the level

ESC for menu
